amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that a lender cannot require a customer to obtain insurance from one of its affiliates, and, that a customer is free to go to an unaffiliated company to obtain insurance if in fact insurance is required as a condition of a loan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 9 printed in H. Rept. 106-214 to clarify that a lender cannot condition a loan on the purchase of an insurance product from the particular lender or one of its subsidiaries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
